--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Beachcomber nodded, "uhhh, yeah. Something like that." he said. He
> turned to Redhot. "Can you transform?" he asked.

::Redhot::

    Redhot gave Beachcomber a humored but inquisative stare, as if 
looking deep into his spark. His red eyes seemed to speak of many 
worlds. 
    "A tad... poetic, arn't I?" he said. His smile faded for a 
momment. "paa...My younger brothers... always accuse me of it."
He chuckled and looked out into the sky again.
    "As..for transforming" He eagerly transformed into his 
pyramid-like format, which made him yelp loudly. The pain of 
transformation forced him back into his bipedal mode. He lay hunched 
over his knees, trembling.
    A momment lapsed before he could speak. 
    "I won't... be doing that again... for a while." he said, teeth 
gritted. "However..I think.. I..I..I can still hover."


Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
